thread.title: Helen K
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Helen K

author: Helen K
title: Helen K
text: On my way in no time at all. Though I have had to wait for a while in the past, I'm sure it just depends on how many people are ahead of me when I arrive. I was in and out in about 15 minutes for my tire change-over. I like how the shop will text you when they start and complete the job. Since their location has shopping nearby, it's nice to get some errands done and know you'll be notified when your car is ready.
